thumb.title: [GUMI] 無駄な地雷少年！ / [VOCALOIDオリジナル]
thumb.description: Producer's notes and fun fact: This song was made for the online submission festival "Boka Gazzaring 2025", which will take place on April 4, 2025. On this track, I tried to combine EDM, indie/punk rock, and a bit of breakcore. The gummy costumes are heavily inspired by jirai-kei culture. That's why the theme of the song is "Landmines". Tools and software used: Megpoid V4 Power, Audiotool Studio, CapCu, tIbisPaintX#vocagatheringBETA
